Posts.EditableText:
A brand **new** game made by **Slowy Pearce** , about a man living in his house, with a laptop that is connected to somewhere dangerous, but because of your curiosity, you placed his **life** into _danger._ What would you do to help him survive....
**Link**: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/uzvgtek410yyhlp5z9ax1q/scp-foundation-unauthorized-access
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: This looks promising! Although I may have encountered a bug. When I checked the warning on the laptop it seemed to lead to a dead end?
Posts.HTML: This looks promising! Although I may have encountered a bug. When I checked the warning on the laptop it seemed to lead to a dead end?

Posts.EditableText: Yes, of course. Because as it is noted on the description, the game is still **under development.** The next update will cover the warning. There are still many other choices for you to find (and also loops for you to create :P).
